review_title: A great place to start in UN
pros: They encouraged to apply to better places to work.
cons: theres a lot of work to do, the bosses can not follow you up.

pros: The work is really inspiring, the benefits are good and you're able to have more impact than NGOs because it's the UN
cons: Experience highly depends on your boss and your hands are tied most if not all the time. It's frustrating to not be able to do much for the people you're supposed to be serving.
